title: Jared Diamond on countries in crisis
itunes:title: Jared Diamond on countries in crisis
itunes:subtitle: Jared Diamond discusses how several nations have coped with traumas through history. historyextra.com/podcasts
description:
Historian, author and geographer Jared Diamond discusses how ideas from psychology can help us understand how countries have coped with traumas through history. historyextra.com/podcasts
